name: Nightmare of the Toys
description:
Nightmare of the Toys

The kids are tormented because of their abusive and troubled household. They vent their anger out on the toys, ripping soft toys to shreds and destroying any toy that comes near them.

Live the nightmare of those toys by becoming one, take control of a plush Teddy and dodge items thrown at you by the children, and dodge their cries.

Your battery is also coming to an end. You goal is to find the active charging port so you can live another day. You get reset every time you die so does the active charging port location.

Controls:

Use W, A, S, D to navigate and Spacebar to jump. Beware, the controls may invert sometimes because it is a nightmare!

Team:-

Pritam Samadder - Development

Anindo Chatterjee – Design

Abhishek Roy – UI Implementation

 Install Instructions:-

Download zip file, Extract and open byog.exe

Alt+F4 to Quit.

BYOG 2021 themes used, RESET and MINIMAL INTERACTION.
